name: Seven Kingdoms Clan Clash
description:
Battle with friends and other players from around the world in real-time and unlock the war cards to use enhanced powers and characters.

Build your team with thousands of combinations to create the ultimate army and take over the world!

Are you royale enough to claim your kingdom?

FEATURES
● Take a duel with other players from around the world in real-time and steal their Trophy Points.
● Earn chests to unlock rewards, new powerful cards or upgrade existing ones.
● Destroy your opponent’s towers and win Crowns to earn epic Crown chests.
● Build and upgrade your card collection with epic skills.
● Construct your ultimate Battle Card Deck to defeat your opponents in Real Time.
● Unlock multiple Arenas all the way to the top.
